answers.answer: I am 32 weeks and 4 days. I was considered high risk at week 30. I have to go to the DR twice a week for baby monitoring and baby growth. They think I have preeclampsia but I don't. They keep a close look out on baby and I. I hope this helps you any.
I just can't figure it out he always says everything is fine and she has time to flip but he wants to monitor her 2 times a week. I go Friday to see him but I'm freaking out and can't wait

Same happened to me at 32 weeks. Doc spot every Monday and Thursday, I'm 35 weeks now. I get a non stress test and ultrasound. Mine is because of high bp and fear of developing preeclampsia. Your doc should let you know what the concern is.

Thanks for replying ladies. I just really don't understand why if he always says everything is fine he needs to see me but I'm going to ask I always do I ask if I'm measuring good, I call about blood work results and ultrasound results and nothing is ever wrong

question: I wasn't told I was high risk but they are making me come in 2 times a week to check babies growth and also giving me an ultrasound every week. Anyone have this happen? And why? I'm freaking out!!! He never says anything is wrong other then she is high breech but at our last appointment he said he thinks she has flipped I'm just worried what is the concern
title: seeing doc 2times a week at 32 weeks?
